title: The Switch
description: While on a school exchange visit to Paris, a young teenager becomes an unexpected witness to a drugs raid. English exchange student Lily holds the key to a serious crime incident at the local Bar Tabac. Making her escape, she heads for the banks of the Seine. But now sheâ€™s not sure why and from whom she is running and what she discovers is not quite what she expects . . .
author: Catherine Condie
